profile:
Fortress Windows and Doors sell and install CSA Certified WindowsEnergyStar,  High Efficiency Windows
We offer our clients Quality, Integrity and Value. We believe that service after the job is completed is just as important as getting paid on the original installation.
I have had the same cell phone number since 1985 so anybody who has conducted business with us knows our number and we ALWAYS respond to our clients.
 
We run TO the problem, not away FROM the problem! (if there is one)
 
We make sure EVERY client is satisfied and that our written contract is fulfilled to the "T". We will never "upcharge" our clients and our word is our bond! (remember those days?)
When we're done your project, we want to see the smile of our clients knowing that they chose the right company to do their renovation!
34 years installing windows and doors.  Home inspector and have many real estate agents as clients who also refer business to Fortress Windows & Doors.

Our Warranty is the absolute BEST in the industry!

profile:
MCBM Roofing Services is not your typical roofing company. We are a family-owned and operated company, specializing in residential and commercial roof installation, replacement, and repair. Our mantra is to always exceed our customers’ expectations.
Founders Marcelo Sosa and Carolina Quagliata have a passion for providing a high level of service to their clients. With 15 years of roofing experience and 20 years in customer service between them, you are guaranteed exceptional quality workmanship and a lasting relationship built on open and honest communication.
We know how crucial the structural integrity of your roof is. It protects your family and your valuables from the elements, helps make your house more energy efficient, and adds value to your home. That is why we are committed to providing our customers with the highest quality roof construction, at a reasonable price. From the beginning of a project to its completion, we pride ourselves on our high standards, professionalism, and superior results. We deliver on our promises, and we guarantee your satisfaction.

profile:
Imperial Roofs were awarded the Vaughan Citizen Readers Choice Award in 2011

In 1968 my father founded Cel Marchildon Roofing, which has grown into the company we have today.  Through commitment to excellence in our workmanship and materials we have built our reputation of TOTAL CUSTOMER SATISFACTION by providing our customers with the BEST ROOFING SYSTEM that will accommodate their needs and budget.  We will provide you, our valued customer, with a detailed assessment that will outline the specific requirements for your home. 

Our expert staff is committed to providing you with the BEST ROOFING EXPERIENCE available in the GTA.  All workers are covered by WORKERS COMPENSATION.  Our company is fully LICENSED AND INSURED to provide you with a WORRY FREE ROOFING EXPERIENCE.  We DO NOT USE ROOFING SUB-CONTRACTORS.  All work is performed by our expert employees. 

This may or may not be your first time purchasing a new roof, however we would like to outline some of the key factors in our operating process:

?	Provide a copy of our Insurance Certificate
?	Provide a copy of Workplace Insurance Safety Board Certificate upon request
?	Provide a copy of our Operating License 
?	Protect your home and surrounding area from falling debris
?	Tear off all old shingles to the roof deck
?	Inspect the wood deck for rotting and warping areas
?	Install eave protection to all insulated eaves 
?	Install name brand shingles with your choice 25 years to limited lifetime guarantee
?	Install proper ventilation to the roof (1sq ft for every 300 sq ft of attic floor area) 
?	Install new metal flashing where needed or refurbish to “new” standards
?	Install closed valleys with aluminum underneath to ensure maximum protection 
?	Full property clean up using magnetic sweeps and trailers to ensure no driveway damage
?	All employees are Fall Safety accredited and Crew Chief First Aid and CPR trained

Services We Provide:
*Asphalt Shingle Replacement
*Gutters, Soffit & Fascia
*Siding - Vinyl, Aluminum
*Leaf Screen for Eavestroughs
*Rooftop Snow & Ice Dam Removal
*Roof Repairs
*Roof Evaluations
*Cedar Shakes
*Slate Roofs
*Insurance Claims
*Ventilation Upgrades

profile:
BLACKSTAR ALUMINUM IS RECOGNIZED AS ONE OF HOMESTARS’ BEST OF 2022 - 2021 - 2020 - 2019 - 2018
 
If you are installing new rain gutters or protecting existing rain gutters contact Blackstar Aluminum - The Best Installer for Your Eavestrough in Toronto (GTA) Region. The Blackstar Aluminum will help you make the right choices with your residential or commercial property. 
 
Blackstar Aluminum replaces/installs 5 and 6 inches residential and commercial eavestroughs in Toronto (GTA). Our specialists can upgrade your eavestroughs with T-Rex or DoublePro, a Continuous Hanger System. Through its unique patented design, T-Rex creates a unified structure that resists bending and twisting. DoublePro is a dual-action gutter protection system. It is built to stand up to the worst weather conditions in Canada and keep your gutter free of ice and debris year after year.  We also install siding, soffit, and fascia in Toronto (GTA), Etobicoke, North York, Scarborough, Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Mississauga, Brampton, York Region.
 
The Blackstar Aluminum is a certified Elite Installer of the Alu-Rex T-Rex Continuous Fastening System. This gives you a lifetime manufacturer's warranty on new installations with T-Rex Continuous Fastening System.  Alu-Rex’s flagship products are covered by the most extensive warranty in the industry: a lifetime warranty on materials, durability, and clog-free performance. 

Call us for a quote today at (416) 989-6527!

profile:
Topflight Aluminum is dedicated to providing quality construction and exceptional customer service. We strive to build lifelong relationships with our customers and to exceed your expectations, in every aspect of the job, from start to finish.
We’ve helped thousands of people improve the look and quality of their homes and businesses. We are proud to serve Toronto (GTA), Etobicoke, North York, Scarborough, Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Markham, Stouffville, King City, Aurora, York Region, Mississauga, Oakville, Hamilton residents with expert craftsmanship and professionalism. We pride ourselves on being able to exceed the expectations of our customers.

•	WHY TopFlight Aluminum?

1.	Quality first, Speed second
We all like our issues to be resolved efficiently when contacting a company, but what will make you use Topflight Aluminum again and again? There is only one answer. The quality of the service!

2.	Great Customer Service
We understand that building or remodeling a home is a major investment, so for us it is important that our customers feel valued. Topflight Aluminum pays special attention to what our clients want, we remember the details no matter how insignificant and deliver quality services at all times.

3.	Top Quality Materials
Apart from good workmanship and top-grade professionals handling your building project, the best quality of materials we use will be next most important factor in determining the outcome of your building.

4.	Warranty

Building your dream house shouldn’t be a nightmare! That’s why we only use guaranteed products and materials with 30- to 50-year warranties. Additionally, all of our work comes with workmanship warranty. Whether you are replacing or repairing, Topflight Aluminum can always meet your needs!

OUR MISSION
Our goal is simple… To perform for our customers the highest level of quality construction services at fair and market competitive prices. We aim to maintain the highest levels of professionalism, integrity, honesty and fairness in our relationships with our suppliers, subcontractors, professional associates and customers.





GET A FREE QUOTE
No unexpected charges —see exactly what your home needs with a free estimate.

profile:
Welcome to King's Aluminum
We specialize in Siding, Soffit, Fascia and Eavestroughs installation in Toronto and the GTA.

We strive to maintain high industry standards to deliver a quality service that meets the high standards of our customers. Along with quality, safety is our priority. We are WSIB certified and all crew members are safety-trained. King's Aluminum Inc. is a proud member and consumer of Gentek, Kycan ,Royal Building Products , Buchner Manufacturing & Alu-Rex.

Our growing company is well established in Toronto and the GTA and relies on an extensive referral program. Along with a free estimate, we provide eavestrough, soffit and fascia and siding services year-round

profile:
*Formely Alliance Aluminum Exteriors*

Alliance Exteriors Inc. is a siding contractor active in the Greater Toronto Area.

Follow us on Instagram!:

www.instagram.com/alliance.exteriors

We are a team of expert siding installers with a combined 25 years of experience in exterior construction and renovations.

We specialize in the installation of various high-end and economical siding materials including james hardie fiber cement, maibec wood, wood grain metal siding, and agway / vicwest metal cladding.  

Some of the brands we specialize in are:
-James Hardie (fibre cement)
-Maibec (wood) 
-Cedar Renditions & Rialux (aluminum)
-Longboard (aluminum) 
-Gentek (aluminum)
-Agway Metal
-VicWest Metal

What sets us apart from many companies is our attention to detail for premium quality results, as well as great customer service, for every project and every client, every time.  Our crews consist of picky and perfectionist installers, and if you're a picky client, then we are the team for you.  

We are also proud members of contractor alliance programs with James Hardy fiber cement products and Gentek Building products. 

We are looking forward and excited to work with your on your next siding project!
products:
-Siding (fiber cement, wood, and metal)
-James Hardie, Maibec, Agway, Cape Cod, Fraser, Allura
-Gutters (5",6",half-round, square-style, soffits, fascias) 
-Custom sheet-metal flashings
services:
Exterior renovations including supply & install of various siding and sheet metal finishing products for residential and commercial applications.

Recently awarded the title of Best of Eastern Ontario for Roofing & Siding companies by HomeStars, Rydel Roofing has more than 30 years of experience as Ottawa's premier roofing service companies. Boasting an A+ BBB Rating, a perfect Facebook Review score and a 97% customer review rating on HomeStars, our business is driven by a passion for elevated customer service, quality craftsmanship and old fashioned honesty. We have been certified to install almost every major roofing and siding product in North America so you can rest assured that our projects are covered under warranty.

Need financing? Ask our team how you can get 24 month ZERO INTEREST equal payments on your latest project!

profile:
For over 48 years we've been installing and upgrading homes all over the GTA and beyond. You can count on our experience to do things right, and on our workmanship to make it look exactly how you envisioned.

We are members of Gentek's 'Premium Renovator Gold' club, a standard recognized as one of the best in the industry. What this means is that you can have confidence in dealing with a renovator whose excellence is recognized nationwide, backed by a written 5-year workmanship guarantee and an exclusive 25-year manufacturer warranty, and that will be around to honour them. You can rest assured of high value in the the service, workmanship and products involved.

We do it all......windows, doors, siding, soffit, fascia, eavestrough, downpipes, aluminum railings, garage doors.

As our tagline says, we use NO SUB-CONTRACTORS. What does this mean to you? This means that all of our employees work for us, not some 3rd party we have no control over. This allows us to guarantee the quality and expediency of the job, which means savings for you!

profile:
Welcome to King's Aluminum
We specialize in Siding, Soffit, Fascia and Eavestroughs installation in Toronto and the GTA.

We strive to maintain high industry standards to deliver a quality service that meets the high standards of our customers. Along with quality, safety is our priority. We are WSIB certified and all crew members are safety-trained. King's Aluminum Inc. is a proud member and consumer of Gentek, Kycan ,Royal Building Products , Buchner Manufacturing & Alu-Rex.

Our growing company is well established in Toronto and the GTA and relies on an extensive referral program. Along with a free estimate, we provide eavestrough, soffit and fascia and siding services year-round

profile:
We offer best quality service for your home. EMR Renovation Services will make sure that we meet the clients expectations. We offer the following services.
1.Residential and Commercial Roof Installation and Repair.
-Asphalt shingle
-Flat roof
-Cedar/Shake single
2. Aluminum Specialties
-Eavestroughs
-Downspouts
-Soffit
-Fascia
-Leaf guards
-Rain barrels
3. Custom installation
-Vinyl, Metal, Fibre-cement, & wood siding
- Window & Door flashing and capping
-Vinyl and aluminum railings
-Skylight
-Chimney, etc.
For further information please contact emrcontracting@hotmail.com, or call at 6476361769.
